entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
